content: One thing the MSM is doing is downplaying any call for prosecution of Bush Aministration officials. We need to move on, don't you know. They have also ignored the story about retired military officers taking what were essentially bribes to push the Bush Administration's view of the invasion of Iraq. And if anyone ever had a free ride with the press, it was George Bush and Ronald Reagan. All they ever got was softball questions. Walt
